featured.text: Over the course of the morning, the innovative discussion process 14 a new form of collective effort that transformed the depth, scope, and quality of their discussion.

definition.zh_def: 深度，指物體或空間的深邃程度或距離。
definition.en_def: The distance from the top or surface to the bottom of something; the quality of being deep.
definition.example: The depth of the lake makes it ideal for fishing.
